Title: EditorConfig core C library: arbitrary stack write
Synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in EditorConfig Core C library, which may lead to arbitrary code execution.

Background.Text: EditorConfig core library written in C (for use by plugins supporting EditorConfig parsing)

Description.Text: A vulnerability has been discovered in EditorConfig Core C library. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifier for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All EditorConfig core C library users should upgrade to the latest version:
